posts.title: Mikey's famous Burger
posts.ingredients: 1. Ground beef 2. Hawaiian Buns 3. Sweet pickles
posts.instructions: 1. Cook burger until liking 2. Put burger on buns 3. add the cheese and pickles

posts.title: Nikki's Favorite Fries
posts.ingredients: 1. Ohio patatos 2. Salt and Peper 3. Chilli seasoning
posts.instructions: 1. chop patatos up 2. Put on a pan 3. Heat up until golden 4. Apply seasoning as needed while heating up
